trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值会使添加事件到cron数组的过程短路,导致函数返回过滤后的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will short-circuit the normal process, returning the filtered value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值会使正常过程短路,返回过滤后的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will short-circuit the normal rescheduling process, causing the function to return the filtered value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值会使正常的重排过程短路,导致函数返回过滤后的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will short-circuit the normal unscheduling process, causing the function to return the filtered value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值会使正常的解调过程短路,导致函数返回过滤后的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will short-circuit the save method, returning that value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值会使保存方法短路,返回该值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will short-circuit the unique slug generation, returning the passed value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值会使唯一的slug生成短路,返回传递的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a positive integer will effectively short-circuit the function.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个正整数将有效地使函数短路。

trans-unit.source: Returning a truthy value from the filter will effectively short-circuit down-sizing the image, returning that value instead.
Returning a truthy value from the filter will effectively short-circuit retrieval and return the passed value instead.
Returning a truthy value from the filter will effectively short-circuit the new post being inserted and return 0. If $wp_error is true, a WP_Error will be returned instead.
Returning a truthy value from the filter will effectively short-circuit the shortlink generation process, returning that value instead.
Returning a truthy value from the filter will skip the current meta object from being exported.
Returning a truthy value to the filter will effectively short-circuit the new post being inserted, returning 0. If $wp_error is true, a WP_Error will be returned instead.
trans-unit.target: 向过滤器返回真实值将有效地使插入的新帖子短路，返回0。如果$ wp_error为true，则将返回WP_Error。

trans-unit.source: Returning a truthy value to the filter will skip the current meta object from being exported.
trans-unit.target: 向过滤器返回truthy值将跳过当前的元对象,使其不被导出。

trans-unit.source: Returning a truthy value, or one that could be evaluated as a WP_Error will effectively short-circuit the installation, returning that value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回truthy值，或一个可以作为一个被评估WP_Error将有效地短路的安装，返回该值来代替。

trans-unit.source: Returning a value of false will effectively short-circuit setting the current user.
trans-unit.target: 返回false值将有效地对当前用户进行短路设置。

trans-unit.source: Returning an array will short-circuit the normal retrieval of ready cron jobs, causing the function to return the filtered value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组会短路正常检索准备好的cron作业,导致函数返回过滤后的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning any other value may result in unexpected behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 返回任何其他值都可能导致意外的行为。

trans-unit.source: Returning anything other than an empty string will effectively short-circuit output of the filesystem credentials form, returning that value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回除空字符串以外的任何内容都会有效地短路文件系统凭证表单的输出,而返回该值。

trans-unit.source: Returning false disables the welcome email.
trans-unit.target: 返回 "false "则会禁用欢迎邮件。

trans-unit.source: Returning false effectively short-circuits display of the control form.
trans-unit.target: 返回false有效地使控制表格的显示短路。

trans-unit.source: Returning false from the filter will disable the ability to override the post lock.
Returning false from the filter will effectively short-circuit wptexturize() and return the original text passed to the function instead.
Returning false from the filter will prevent the dialog from being displayed.
Returning false from the filter will skip saving the current option.

trans-unit.target: 返回false将绕过代理,返回true将通过代理发送请求。返回null将绕过过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Returning false will effectively short-circuit display of the widget.
